name: Box The Game
description:
Box The Game

An android platformer game, where you are a box that's trying to escape a basement, the outside, and the sky.

  • The gameplay is very simple, but at the same time interesting.
  • There are 3 Chapters (1 Chapter has 3 Levels)
  • Unique music in every chapter

Don't expect much, it's my first ever Unity game and this game wasn't supposed to even release, but in the end, I decided to release it anyways.
